Title: The Lovely Bones
Overview: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
Tagline: The story of a life and everything that came after...
Keywords: rape, 1970s, evidence, tree, afterlife, loss of daughter, serial killer, corpse, pedophile, teenage love, grieving, childhood sexual abuse, based on young adult novel
production_companies: WingNut Films, DreamWorks SKG, Key Creatives, Film4, Goldcrest Pictures, New Zealand Large Budget Screen Production Grant
Cast: Rachel Weisz, Mark Wahlberg, Susan Sarandon
